document.description: To supersize is to order the largest size available, often for a meal deal at a fast food restaurant. (verb)
document.body:
Dictionary Home » Dictionary Definitions »supersize supersize Listen See in a sentence To supersize is to order the largest size available, often for a meal deal at a fast food restaurant. (verb) An example of supersize is to order a double cheeseburger meal at McDonald's and ask to get the largest sizes of fries and soft drink. A supersize is the largest size of an item available. (adjective) An example of a supersize is a supersize order of French fries, the largest size of French fries that you can buy at a fast food restaurant.
